About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment only. General reference assistance available. Copying services for books and journals available.

About.Access: Access form must be completed; one week (minimum) should be allowed for approval. Closed period of 25 years applies for records of Bible College of Victoria. Access to records not normally available for research can be gained subject to approval by Principal.

About.Acquisition focus: The collection focus is on material of a missiological nature deposited by various mission organisations and agencies working both within Australia and overseas.
